name: Recruitment Sales
description: Our story began in an Estonian garage in 2010. Pipedrive’s co-founders were salespeople who needed more from a CRM tool than the software on the market could offer. So, they built an easy-to-use, visual sales platform to help users streamline their processes and get more done. Since then, we’ve grown into a global unicorn. Our team of 850+ people across eight countries works tirelessly toward one goal: empowering small businesses everywhere to succeed. Backed by global investment firm Vista Equity Partners and with the support of our thriving community, we continuously strive to push the boundaries of what an easy-to-use and effective sales CRM can do to help small businesses win more deals.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: The one platform to grow your business.
ShortDescription: Every company needs the right tools to blossom. To scale your business, you need software that’s accessible, offers the right functionality, is quick to master and highlights key opportunities.

Highlights.name: Easy-to-Use Sales CRM:
Highlights.description: Pipedrive positions itself as an easy-to-use and effective CRM (Customer Relationship Management) tool, specifically designed to help businesses manage their sales pipeline.

Highlights.name: Visual Sales Pipeline
Highlights.description: Pipedrive emphasizes their visual sales pipeline, which allows users to see all their sales activities and deals at a glance in a kanban-style board. This can help sales teams stay organized, prioritize tasks, and track progress towards closing deals.

Highlights.name: Affordable and Effective
Highlights.description: Pipedrive highlights its affordability and effectiveness, making it a good fit for small and medium-sized businesses.

competitive_advantages: Visual sales pipeline with kanban-style board
scalability_features: Designed for business growth and scaling
